image:image.image:title: A scenic mountain landscape in the White Mountain National Forest of New Hampshire, featuring Bondcliff and surrounding ridgelines. This photograph highlights rugged terrain, forested slopes, and layered White Mountains wilderness popular with hikers and peakbaggers.
image:image.image:caption: This photograph features Bondcliff in New Hampshire's White Mountain National Forest. The scene shows forested slopes, rocky ridgelines, and distant mountain ranges fading into the horizon. It reflects the scale and terrain hikers experience in the White Mountains, home to many of New Hampshire's 4,000-foot peaks and backcountry trails.
